message: Let's split the money 60/40.  A fair deal for us both to get something!
Let's split it 55/45, I think I deserve a bit more!
Bob, I understand you want a bit more, but my offer in Round 1 was fairer. Let's meet in the middle. This is the last round I'm willing to accept this split.
I'm willing to compromise, 52/48 is as low as I'll go.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're losing money with every round!  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day!
